Query.Title: Returns Earning Calls For A Company
Query.ReqPackage: Events 1 Year Rolling Daily, Textual Data Analytics - Transcripts (Core), Transcripts History Span
Query.Description: The following sample query returns earnings calls for a company using specific keywords using the SP Capital IQ Transcripts package in Xpressfeed. This example uses earnings calls for Macys / Nordstrom / J.C. Penny using the word weather.

Query.Title: Returns Earning Calls Where CEO Answers Questions Using Specific Keywords For A Company
Query.ReqPackage: Events 1 Year Rolling Daily, Textual Data Analytics - Transcripts (Core), Transcripts History Span
Query.Description: The following sample query earnings calls where CEO answers questions using specific keywords using the SP Capital IQ Transcripts package in Xpressfeed. This example uses earnings calls where Tim Cook answered a question for Apple Inc using the word acquisition.

Query.Title: Returns Aggregate Count Of Mentions Of A Specific Keyword
Query.ReqPackage: Euronext Constituent History, Euronext Index Level, Events 1 Year Rolling Daily, Textual Data Analytics - Transcripts (Core), Transcripts History Span
Query.Description: The following sample query returns aggregate count of mentions of a specific keyword, such as weather for this example, during earnings calls for an index by year using the SP Capital IQ Transcripts package in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Returns Aggregate Count Of Distinct Analysts Who Asked A Question During Quarterly Earnings Call
Query.ReqPackage: Events 1 Year Rolling Daily, Textual Data Analytics - Transcripts (Core), Transcripts History Span
Query.Description: The following sample query returns aggregate count of distinct analysts who asked a question for a companys quarterly earnings call using the S&P Capital IQ Transcripts package in Xpressfeed. (Here for Apple Inc.)

Query.Title: Returns Linkage Of Transcripts To Events
Query.ReqPackage: Events 1 Year Rolling Daily, Textual Data Analytics - Transcripts (Core)
Query.Description: The following sample query returns linkage of transcripts to events for a company using the SP Capital IQ Transcripts package in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Returns Earning Calls where an analyst asked a question for an Index Constituent
Query.ReqPackage: Euronext Constituent History, Euronext Index Level, Events 1 Year Rolling Daily, FTSE Index Level, Intel Professional, Textual Data Analytics - Transcripts (Core), Transcripts History Span
Query.Description: The following sample query returns earnings calls where an analyst asked a question for an Index Constituent using the SP Capital IQ Transcripts package in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Returns Latest Transcript For An Event
Query.Description: The following sample query returns latest transcript for an event using the SP Capital IQ Transcripts package in Xpressfeed.
